front.title: DHCP Based Configuration of Mobile Node from Home Network

abstract.t: This document describes the mechanism for providing the hostconfiguration parameters needed for network service from home networkbased on DHCPINFORM. DHCPINFORM message has been widely used byclient to obtain other configuration information and could be sent tolocal broadcast address or server unicast address. Mobile IPspecification could support DHCPINFORM broadcast or unicast messagestraightfully without any revision.
